title: XYZ Bank Scam
description: Massive ₹3000 crore banking scam under investigation by CBI.
shortUpdate: Hearing scheduled in Supreme Court next week.

title: Celebrity Hit-and-Run Case
description: High-profile case involving a well-known actor's car accident.
shortUpdate: Accused found guilty and sentenced to 5 years in prison.

title: Political Bribery Scandal
description: Allegations of ₹200 crore bribe during state elections.
shortUpdate: ED submitted chargesheet to special court.

title: Hospital Negligence Case
description: Patient death due to lack of oxygen supply in ICU.
shortUpdate: Case under National Consumer Disputes Commission review.

title: IT Company Data Breach
description: Leak of personal data of over 2 million users.
